result.arabic_text: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
result.translation: Umusi w’isango ugeze, nya bakonikoni karuhariwe bariyegeranije bashika kwa Firawuni, bamubaza bati: “Mbega none, ubwo duhava turonka agashimwe gashimishije, nitwaramuka dutsinze Musa?”.
